The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 09 August is 269,011 (477.9 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 05 August, there were 5,160 new confirmed cases (9.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 29 July, there were 4,999 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 3% (161 extra cases).
